About Musey

Musey was designed from the ground up to make your music curation experience the best around.

Designed by Ardavan Amini, Arjun Iyer and Stefan Rimola.

Questions, comments or suggestions? Email us at museyapp@gmail.com

Musey
What are you in the mood for?

Musey makes finding new music fun and easy. Pick a mood, activity, genre to find playlists tailored to your tastes and personality!
